title: He’s Leaving A Lasting Impression On Women
itunes:title: He’s Leaving A Lasting Impression On Women
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 32 year old divorced woman, who filed for divorce after only 2 years of marriage. Right after we said “I do,” I noticed a change in my husband and he could go 3 weeks without having sex with me. He kept making excuses to leave the house and would be gone for up to an hour when he left to “run a quick errand.” Then about 8 months ago, I walked in on him as he washed himself off in our bathroom sink, after he claimed he went to Dunkin for a cup of coffee................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 32 year old divorced woman, who filed for divorce after only 2 years of marriage. Right after we said “I do,” I noticed a change in my husband and he could go 3 weeks without having sex with me. He kept making excuses to leave the house and would be gone for up to an hour when he left to “run a quick errand.” Then about 8 months ago, I walked in on him as he washed himself off in our bathroom sink, after he claimed he went to Dunkin for a cup of coffee................
